productStrings.marketingDescriptionPrimary: Microsoft R is a free, community-supported, data science tool for high performance analytics. Microsoft R Open is built on top of R so you can use any open source R package to build your analytics.
productStrings.marketingDescriptionSecondary: R is the worldâ€™s most powerful, and preferred, programming language for statistical computing, machine learning, and graphics, and is supported by a thriving global community of users, developers, and contributors. Developers frequently provide tools incorporating their expertise in the form of R packages. Traditionally, using R in an enterprise setting has presented certain challenges, especially as the volume of data rises, or when faced with a need to deploy solutions to production environments.
